projects.name: Email Client Frontend - React
projects.info: The goal for this project was to create a responsive front end for an email client based on an existing API. This was built using React. I worked on the page for composing the a new email & helped oversee the merging of various branches to ensure all of the components work together successfully.

projects.name: Project Management App - PHP
projects.info: This is a project management page to track the deadline & priority of tasks. My team & I used PHP to connect the pre-existing API and front end. I worked on the service that handles the deadline dates, and did various unit tests.

projects.name: Hotel Booking API - Laravel
projects.info: The aim for this team project was to build the API for a hotel booking system. This was written in Laravel using object-oriented programming. I worked on various GET and POST routes, and wrote unit tests to check that the routes worked correctly.
